member.name: M:Events.Controllers.AccountController.Token(Events.Models.Person)
member.summary: Returns the generated token for the user
member.param: The Person-object to which the token needs to be issued

member.name: M:Events.Controllers.AccountController.Get
member.summary: Simulation of providing data only to an authorized user

member.name: M:Events.Controllers.EventsController.Get
member.summary: Returns the full list of events from the database

member.name: M:Events.Controllers.EventsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns certain EventDto-object by id from the database
member.param: Id of the specific user to return

member.name: M:Events.Controllers.EventsController.Post(Events.Models.EventDto)
member.summary: Adds certain Event-object to the database
member.param: The EventDto-object required to be added to the database

member.name: M:Events.Controllers.EventsController.Put(Events.Models.EventDto)
member.summary: Edit certain Event-object in the database
